#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main() {
  int t, num_0, num_1, num_diff_0, num_diff_1;
  string a, b;

  scanf("%d", &t);
  cin.ignore();

  for (int i= 0; i < t; ++i) {
    num_0 = num_1 = num_diff_0 = num_diff_1 = 0;
    getline(cin, a, '\n');
    getline(cin, b, '\n');

    for (int j = 0, k = 0; j < a.length(); ++j, ++k) {
      if (a[j] == '1') {
	num_1++;
	if (a[j] != b[k]) num_diff_1++;
      } else {
	num_0++;
	if (a[j] != b[k]) num_diff_0++;
      }
    }
      
    if (num_0 == 0 || num_1 == 0) printf("Unlucky Chef\n");
    else printf("Lucky Chef\n%d\n", std::max(num_diff_1, num_diff_0));
  }
  return 0;
}
